      • listEnrollmentClaims

        @API
 @Nullable
public ListResponse<EnrollmentClaim> listEnrollmentClaims(@Nullable
                                                                            ListOptions options)
                                                                     throws MbedCloudException
        Deprecated. 
        Lists all device enrolment claims.

        Example: 

         
 try {
     ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
      options.setLimit(20);

     ListResponse<EnrollmentClaim> enrollments = enrollmentApi.listEnrollmentClaims(options);
     for (EnrollmentClaim enrollment : enrollments) {
         System.out.println(enrollment.toString());
     }
 } catch (MbedCloudException e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }
        Parameters:
        options - list options.
        Returns:
        The list of enrolments (One page).
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during request processing.

      • listAllEnrollmentClaims

        @API
 @Nullable
public Paginator<EnrollmentClaim> listAllEnrollmentClaims(@Nullable
                                                                            ListOptions options)
                                                                     throws MbedCloudException
        Deprecated. 
        Gets an iterator over all device enrolment claims.

        Example: 

         
 try {
     ListOptions options = new ListOptions();
     Paginator<EnrollmentClaim> enrollments = enrollmentApi.listAllEnrollmentClaims(options);
     while (enrollments.hasNext()) {
         System.out.println(enrollments.next());
     }

 } catch (MbedCloudException e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }
        Parameters:
        options - filter options.
        Returns:
        paginator @see Paginator for the list of device enrolments corresponding to filter options.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during request processing.

 try {

     System.out.println(deviceEnrollment);

 } catch (MbedCloudException e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • addEnrollmentClaim

        @API
 @Nullable
public EnrollmentClaim addEnrollmentClaim(@NonNull
                                                            java.lang.String claimId)
                                                     throws MbedCloudException
        Deprecated. 
        Places an enrolment claim for one or several devices.

        Example: 

         
 try {
     String claimId = "A-35:e7:72:8a:07:50:3b:3d:75:96:57:52:72:41:0d:78:cc:c6:e5:53:48:c6:65:58:5b:fa:af:4d:2d:73:95:c5";
     EnrollmentClaim claim = enrollmentApi.addEnrollmentClaim(claimId)
     System.out.println(claim);

 } catch (MbedCloudException e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }
        Parameters:
        claimId - Claim Id. Pattern: '^[A-Z]{1}-[A-Za-z0-9:]{1, 256}' e.g. A-35:e7:72:8a:07:50:3b:3d:75:96:57:52:72:41:0d:78:cc:c6:e5:53:48:c6:65:58:5b:fa:af:4d:2d:73:95:c5
        Returns:
        enrollment claim.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during request processing.
